description: Digital House is a coding school designed to train a new generation of technology professionals in Latin America.
Dito CRM is a technology company that offers an online platform to help companies identify the profile of their consumers in order to target retention marketing.
Doce d’ocê white labels products for supermarket bakeries, employing a fully centralized production using deep freezing technology.

Docket is a Brazilian LegalTech SaaS company that provides eNotary Infrastructure and document management services, helping clients cut through bureaucracy and achieve regulatory compliance with ease.
DocNetwork is a comprehensive electronic health record system, offering solutions to improve efficiency and maximize safety in local camp, child care and school communities.
Docsity is an online platform for students to access and share resources with their peers globally.
Dominio del Plata is a boutique winery dedicated to the production of high quality wines.
Don’t Worry makes great-tasting, low-calorie snacks to satisfy the Mexican population’s growing demand for healthier snacking alternatives.
Dosfarma is an online pharmacy that aims to make everything – from cosmetics to over the counter drugs – accessible and convenient for Spanish consumers.
DoveVivo creates a simple way for real estate owners to fill vacant apartments, while providing medium- and long-term rental solutions for students and young professionals across European cities.

dr.consulta is Brazil’s largest provider of private primary care and telemedicine services. Enabled by smart technology, dr.consulta provides low-cost healthcare services, focused on the bottom of the pyramid.

Drillco designs and manufactures high-quality mining products and tools, offering custom-made solutions for industries such as oil & gas, geothermal, quarries, waterwell, and civil engineering drilling.

DROUGHT manufactures cold-pressed fruit and vegetable juice, non-thermally processed to extend the shelf life without degrading nutrients and enzymes, providing consumers with healthy, glass-bottled products.

DRUID is an end-to-end platform for building AI-driven conversational business applications, designed to deliver next-level employee productivity and total customer experience in the most intuitive way.
DryWash offers the first fast carwash service using ecologically conscious products and no water.
Dscaff designs and manufactures modular scaffolding equipment for the oil & gas, infrastructure, energy and construction industries throughout SEA.

Dsquares offers loyalty programs that bring customers closer to their consumers. Dsquares’ solutions diversify from full loyalty programs, user friendly couponing solutions to differentiated directory assistance services.
Dubai Desert Extreme (DDE) is a distributor and retailer of sporting goods in the MENA region.
Düğün.com is the biggest wedding planning platform in Turkey, connecting wedding vendors to engaged couples.
Duplays organizes fitness, sport & social activities.
